title: Blade of saeldor (c)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Blade of Saeldor (c) is a corrupted version of the blade of Saeldor that does not degrade, with its appearance altered to resemble the corrupted crystal seen within The Corrupted Gauntlet. The blade's colour can be changed by using crystals purchased from Lliann's Wares; the crystal of Hefin returns the blade to its previously default corrupted red colour, while the crystal of Meilyr gives it the original, uncorrupted blue colour of the blade of Saeldor.

SMW Subobject for CrwysHigh Alchemy value: 3000000Examine: A magical elven sword, corrupted through the addition of too many shards.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Blade of saeldor (c)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Blade of saeldor (c) (Crwys).pngWeight: 1.814Value: 5000000Version anchor: CrwysRelease date: 30 June 2021Item ID: 25878

The Blade of Saeldor (c) is a corrupted version of the blade of Saeldor that does not degrade, with its appearance altered to resemble the corrupted crystal seen within The Corrupted Gauntlet. The blade's colour can be changed by using crystals purchased from Lliann's Wares; the crystal of Hefin returns the blade to its previously default corrupted red colour, while the crystal of Meilyr gives it the original, uncorrupted blue colour of the blade of Saeldor.

The blade can be upgraded by bringing it and 1,000 crystal shards to a singing bowl. Doing so requires level 82 Smithing and Crafting (the levels can be boosted), and grants no experience. If the player does not meet the Smithing and Crafting requirements, they can have Conwenna or Reese sing the crystal for them for an extra 500 crystal shards. Excess charges in the blade will be taken into account; for example, a fully charged blade will only cost 800 crystal shards to upgrade. Upon creating the corrupted blade, the chatbox message states "With the help of the crystal bowl, you sing a dark song which corrupts the crystals."

While untradeable, the blade can be uncharged, but the crystal shards used to upgrade it will not be returned.

Like its regular variant, the blade requires level 80 Attack to wield, and provides the second highest strength and slash bonus out of any weapon for its attack speed, surpassing the abyssal tentacle as the best slash weapon. It is tied with the Ghrazi rapier as the second strongest one-handed melee weapon in the game, after the Inquisitor's mace, although it is outperformed by the Scythe of Vitur against large monsters.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 May 2022
(update)

The blade of Saeldor now requires level 80 Attack to wield instead of level 75 Attack.

30 June 2021
(update | poll)

Crystals from Lliann's Wares can now be used to recolour the blade.

16 April 2020
(update)
  • The item's name was changed from "Blade of saeldor (i)" to "Blade of saeldor (c)", wherein the (i) stood for "imbued".
  • The examine text was changed; previously, it was "A magical elven sword."

The '''Blade of Saeldor (c)''' is a corrupted version of the [[blade of Saeldor]] that does not degrade, with its appearance altered to resemble the corrupted crystal seen within [[The Corrupted Gauntlet]]. The blade's colour can be changed by using crystals purchased from [[Lliann's Wares]]; the [[crystal of Hefin]] returns the blade to its previously default corrupted red colour, while the [[crystal of Meilyr]] gives it the original, uncorrupted blue colour of the [[blade of Saeldor]].

The blade can be upgraded by bringing it and 1,000 [[crystal shard]]s to a [[singing bowl]]. Doing so requires level 82 [[Smithing]] and [[Crafting]] (the levels can be [[Temporary skill boost|boosted]]), and grants no experience. If the player does not meet the Smithing and Crafting requirements, they can have [[Conwenna]] or [[Reese]] sing the crystal for them for an extra 500 crystal shards. Excess charges in the blade will be taken into account; for example, a fully charged blade will only cost 800 crystal shards to upgrade. Upon creating the corrupted blade, the chatbox message states "''With the help of the crystal bowl, you sing a dark song which corrupts the crystals.''"

While untradeable, the blade can be uncharged, but the crystal shards used to upgrade it will '''not''' be returned.

Like its regular variant, the blade requires level 80 [[Attack]] to wield, and provides the second highest strength and slash bonus out of any weapon for its [[attack speed]], surpassing the [[abyssal tentacle]] as the best [[slash weapon]]. It is tied with the [[Ghrazi rapier]] as the second strongest one-handed melee weapon in the game, after the [[Inquisitor's mace]], although it is outperformed by the [[Scythe of Vitur]] against large monsters.

|change = 
*The item's name was changed from "Blade of saeldor (i)" to "Blade of saeldor (c)", wherein the (i) stood for "imbued".
